title: Those who got their documents verified at KEA: Do study certificates contain address and phone number of BEO office or just the signature and seal of BEO office?

comments.body: No the study certificate presented to the kea is a just a proof that the student has studied in this institute for these many years. It has other details like mother tongue and stuff. At the kea office they didn't put any seal or anything, they just scanned it, and the other documents and gave a verification slip that's it.
